duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide technical expertise to support the company's growing Ag solar business.
Serve as the primary technical customer contact and work closely with sales, marketing, and design engineering teams to support business growth.
Analyze customer needs and match to product offerings by supporting proposal development.
Act as a liaison between customers and Valmont's engineering teams in problem solving and technical expertise.
Coordinate customer visits & meetings, provide agendas and ensure appropriate personnel participate.
Design solar system per utility company guidelines and code.
Lead webinars as part of customer outreach/training of installers on our products.
Support product development activities through idea creation, concept validation, gathering customer insights, and support validation testing.
Travel into the field (25%) to provide technical sales support and training to support sales efforts as needed.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree with 6+ years relevant experience (Master's preferred)
